summary: Matt and I went on an adventure today! First we picked up a pie from my realtor for thanksgiving , then we went to petsmart for...
body: Matt and I went on an adventure today! First we picked up a pie from my realtor for thanksgiving , then we went to petsmart for litter, then we visited his grandparents to drop off the pie and get a pair of hooks for the craft room. And every time Matt meowed in the car I said “I love you” to him.

reblog.comment: Matt and I went on an adventure today! And every time Matt meowed in the car I said “I love you” to him.

Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

tags: wouldn't tag this as m*ttelektr* tbh
summary: “What was it you called me? Matt Murderdock? I dig it. Makes a nice hashtag.”  Some design ideas on Earth 65/Reverse AU that I...
caption:
“What was it you called me? Matt Murderdock? I dig it. Makes a nice hashtag.”

Some design ideas on Earth 65/Reverse AU that I reversed and did Elektra as well so that’s fun. There’s some more ideas below the cut so I don’t end up spamming everyone ^^;

Matt:

Following Earth 65 backstory- Born to Jack and Maggie. Taken in by the Stick who was promptly murdered by the Hand, he joined said evil ninja cult and ended up becoming an assassin, sent off to Empire to study law and eventually became Fisk’s attorney. When Fisk was sent off to prison, Matt took over his position and became the new Kingpin until Fisk returns. 

Elektra: 

Since Stick died early on, it’s easier for Elektra to not be groomed into basing her need for validation in killing. Still taken in by Mr. Natchios Elektra was able to actually grow and enjoy and have fun without Stick breathing down her neck on being the Chaste’s weapon for a war that’ll never come. Since Matt doesn’t go to her university she wouldn’t have met him there either. 

But the Black Sky’s whole shtick with destined to be a weapon can’t be ignored. So the Hand goes after Elektra and she decides to put her skills to use. And trying to help one person turns into helping more and more and more until people start calling her? A vigilante? 

Elektra just rolls with it tbh 

Got her using an electric baton because it’s non-lethal and she’s killed once and never wants to walk down that path again. Doubt she’d have met Foggy but lets say she does: Elektra and Foggy being friends would be awesome. Probs not super close, but maybe reconnecting after college and helping him get a job as a lawyer/having him as a contact. 

History between the two:

Bad. 

I mean, Matt works for the Hand and Elektra very clearly doesn’t want to. They’d probably butt ends a lot. Matt in this world is not against killing in the slightest and Elektra is disgusted by the idea. You know, a fun little reverse thing.


fjhgsakjdfg there’s probably like 1000000 plot holes in this but HUSH I LIKE THIS SO LET ME HAVE IT 

Add: Maybe Elektra should actually be “Black Sky” instead of “The Devil/Daredevil”. Hmm.

 Admins: Allison & Lexi!

summary:
Hello!
It is time for this year's Hictor December Challenge. This will be the second year we have hosted this and I'm excited. I...
body:
Hictor December Challenge 2018

Hello!

It is time for this year’s Hictor December Challenge. This will be the second year we have hosted this and I’m excited. I hope you guys will be able to have fun with this.

So here is the information about it, for those who don’t know:

The Hictor December Challenge is a list of winter or Christmas themed prompts for all 31 days of December. BOTH artists and writers are able to join in. The prompt can be anything you want that is involving that particular prompt, and it must have hiccup and victor in it as the main characters. You are welcome to add others in any of them, if you wish.

For example, the first day’s prompt is scarves. You could draw Hiccup and Victor sharing a scarf, or write a little oneshot of them trying on different scarves. All of the prompts give you guys any creativity you’d like !

I hope some of you will be interested in participating. Also, you do NOT have to do all 31 days. You can do as many as you want.

You may repost this or upload your entries ( when December 1st starts ) in the hashtag #hictordecemberchallenge . I hope you all like this year’s prompt choices, and if you still have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask! Thank you ❤

1. Scarves

2. Decorations

3. White Christmas

4. Shopping for gifts

5. Marshmallows

6. Mistletoe

7. Reindeer

8. Pillow Fort

9. Gingerbread

10. Sleigh Bells

11. Wrapping Gifts

12. Ugly Christmas Sweaters

13. Christmas Wine

14. Baby’s First Christmas

15. Warm Snuggles

16. Yaknog

17. Snowman

18. Christmas Tree

19. Snowball Fight

20. Santa Hats

21. Red Nose

22. Santa’s Little Helper

23. Snoggletog

24. Family Fun

25. Merry Christmas

26. Sledding

27. Nightfury Cuddles

28. Candy Canes

29. Stuck In Snow

30. Resolutions

31. New Year Kisses

blog.name: awesomenerdscorner
blog.title: Awesome Nerds Corner
blog.description: A nerd who enjoys games, anime, comics, and...well...nerd...type...things lol I'm a self-published writer, I do gameplay videos on youtube, streams on youtube as well as Twitch, and even do some music on Soundcloud as a member of the Cosmic Saints. Hopefully you can enjoy it all :D You can call me Ultronimus or Ult/Ultro for short.
